attributes.action: Amend the Consessionary Bus Scheme to the following
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Following changes, should be made to the consessionary travel scheme.
1: Fares costing less than £2 should be paid in full by the bus pass holder.On any single journey.
2: Half Fares should apply before 0930, and not full single fares at present, on production of the bus pass.
3: Those having a bus pass, which under the current womens retirement of 60, should have more documented proof of need.
